doc:
R. G. Armstrong https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R._G._Armstrong 0 Robert Golden Armstrong Jr. (April 7, 1917 – July 27, 2012) was an American actor and playwright. A veteran character actor who appeared in dozens of Westerns over the course of his 40-year career, he may be best remembered for his work with director Sam Peckinpah. Robert_Golden_Armstrong_Jr. ( April_7_,_1917 – July_27_,_2012 ) was an_American_actor_and_playwright . A_veteran_character_actor who appeared in dozens of Westerns over the_course of his_40-year_career , he may_be_best_remembered for his_work with director_Sam_Peckinpah .
